main.name: Vinod Darapu
main.shortDesc: Highly accomplished and user-focused Frontend developer adept in collaborating with UX Design, Product and Backend teams to plan the technical writing and execution of functional specifications of web applications. Experienced in building multi-platform frontend applications using responsive web design with attention to scalability, performance and accessibility

about.title: Senior Frontend Web Developer, Bytemark - Bangalore
about.about: Experienced Frontend developer with over 8+ years of experience in IT industry. Excellent reputation for resolving problems and improving customer satisfaction. Skilled in Javascript, ES6, Typescript, HTML5, CSS3, and Angular2+, ReactJS/NextJS, Webpack, Redux, Jasmine/Karma, LESS/SCSS, RxJs and NgRx. Proficient on versioning tools like - GitLab/GitHub, Bitbucket. Basic knowledge on NodeJs/Express, MongoDB, PolymerJs, Unix/Unix Scripting and AWS S3. Strong information technology professional with a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) focused in Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering from SVIST (aka Viswam College), Angallu.

educations.institute: SVIST (aka Viswam Engineering College) | Angallu - Andhra Pradesh

desc: Part of Finacle product support for set of banks which are based on Finacle ver7.x and 10.x
Develop the correction SQLs or PL/SQL programs to rectify the non-simulateable issues
Responsibilities include simulations, system/logs analysis, troubleshooting issues, testing and providing robust solution to the customers
Certified patches testing and proper deployment at offshore using APDM tool
Responsibility of delivering certified patches with banks
Requirements gathering for enhancements and providing customisation workflow to the customers
Develop the scripts for internal purpose using Finacle scripting and Unix shell scripting
Analysing the tickets raised by banks and providing fixes on priority
On call support and provide immediate solution to customers for high priority issues
Involved in version migration team and implementation
Skills: HTML5 路 CSS3 路 JavaScript 路 SQL 路 PL/SQL 路 Shell Scripting 路 Unix 路 Finacle Scripting
Project 2: Finacle Digital Banker Product Development & FMT (Mar 2018 - Sep 2019)
Project 1: Finacle Core Banking Support ( Aug 2015 to Feb 2018)
Analysing the use cases provided by the functional team to convert it into the technical specification.
Designing the UI use cases as per wireframes provided by functional team using Angular components, HTML5, CSS3 and Typescript.
Integrating the UI with REST APIs for completing the full requirement
Participate in feature discussion, feasibility and estimation of new features with the Technical Lead
Involved in new feature development and designing
Skills: HTML5 路 CSS3 路 JavaScript/TypeScript 路 Angular 2+ 路 PolymerJS v1 路 NgRx 路 RxJs 路 REST APIs Integration 路 Angular Material 路 SQL 路 Shell Scripting
Designing and developing the UI use cases as per wireframes provided by client using Angular framework and NgRx as state management library.
Integrating the UI with REST api's to fulfil the requirements.
Writing unit test cases using Jasmine and executing with Karma
Analysing, validating and fixing the defects created by QA team
Providing KT sessions and mentor the team members
Skills: HTML5 路 CSS3 路 JavaScript/TypeScript 路 Angular 7, 8 & 9 路 Jasmine/Karma 路 NgRx 路 RxJs 路 REST APIs Integration 路 Angular Material
